name: Shoot The Vegetables!
description:
A and D to move - Space to jump - Aim and shoot with the mouse

Did you know guns hate vegetables? Well, they do, and this game gives you the opportunity to experience what it's like to be a vegetable hating gun.

Of course, not eating vegetables comes with downsides, and our troubled protagonist has developed a crippling vitamin deficiency!

Make your stand against the hoards of vegetables while carefully managing your health, which goes down every time you shoot, due to how fragile and weak you are.

Made in 72 hours for the Cult of Jabrils - Stay@Home Jam

CC0 music from opengameart.org was used for the menu theme and in-game music:

  • Menu Theme: https://opengameart.org/content/doodle-menu-like-song
  • Main Theme: https://opengameart.org/content/robotic-city-v2
